original_text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him, If ye continue in my word, then are ye my disciples indeed;
korean_text: 그러므로 예수께서 자기를 믿은 유대인들에게 이르시되 너희가 내 말에 거하면 참으로 내 제자가 되고

sentences.original_text: to those Jews which believed on him
If ye continue in my word
then are ye my disciples indeed
